wikipedia_page.main:
Amanda G. Chetwynd  is a British mathematician and statistician specializing in combinatorics and spatial statistics.
She is Professor of Mathematics and Statistics and Provost for Student Experience, Colleges and the Library at Lancaster University, and a Principal Fellow of the Higher Education Academy.

response: *A conjecture of Amanda Chetwynd and Anthony Hilton (possibly going back earlier to the work of Gabriel Andrew Dirac) that regular graphs with an even number  of vertices and with degree at least  are of class 1.
* Amanda Chetwynd, British mathematician and statistician
* Amanda Chetwynd, British combinatorist and spatial statistician
